# Generated by python script for Russia Reworked

                is_in_array = { sov_national_obligations_unlocked_indexes = 12 }
            }
        }
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_RUSSIAN_REALM_UNLOCKED
    }
    text = {
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_RUSSIAN_REALM_NOT_UNLOCKED
    }
}

# Rebirth
defined_text = {
    name = GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavRebirth
    text = {
        trigger = {
            THIS = {
                check_variable = {
                    sov_national_obligations_selected_index = 13
                }
            }
        }
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_INDEX_NAV_SELECTED
    }
    text = {
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_INDEX_NAV_NOT_SELECTED
    }
}

defined_text = {
    name = GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavRebirthTitle
    text = {
        trigger = {
            THIS = {
                check_variable = {
                    sov_national_obligations_selected_index = 13
                }
            }
        }
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_REBIRTH_SELECTED
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            THIS = {
                is_in_array = { sov_national_obligations_unlocked_indexes = 13 }
            }
        }
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_REBIRTH_UNLOCKED
    }
    text = {
        localization_key = GUI_NATIONAL_OBLIGATIONS_REBIRTH_NOT_UNLOCKED
    }
}

# Scripted GUI
sov_national_obligations_nav_industrial_awakening = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavIndustrialAwakening]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_tsar_bomba = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavTsarBomba]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_unfailing_army = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavUnfailingArmy]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_grand_fleet = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavGrandFleet]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_proletarian_union = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavProletarianUnion]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_neverending_story = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavNeverendingStory]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_continental_system = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavContinentalSystem]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_treaty_moscow = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavTreatyMoscow]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_golden_age = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavGoldenAge]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_imperial_obligations = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavImperialObligations]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_carry_on_legacy = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavCarryOnLegacy]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_russian_realm = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavRussianRealm]
}

sov_national_obligations_nav_rebirth = {
    image = [THIS.GetCurrentSelectedIndexNationalObligationsNavRebirth]
}

    #Industrial Awakening
    containerWindowType = {
        name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_view"
        position = { x = 0 y = 0 }
        size = { width = 1000 height = 800 }
        orientation = center
        origo = center
        moveable = no
        click_to_front = no
        clipping = no
        fade_type = linear
        fade_time = 500

        buttonType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_confirm_button"
            position = { x = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_X y = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_Y }
            orientation = "CENTER"
            spriteType = "GFX_national_obligations_confirm_button_gui"
            shortcut = "RETURN"
            buttonText = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_confirm_button
            buttonFont = cg_18b
            pdx_tooltip = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_confirm_button_tt
            alwaystransparent = no
        }

        #Option 1
        containerWindowType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option"
            position = { x = @THREE_OPTION_FIRST_X y = @THREE_OPTION_FIRST_Y }
            size = { width = 250 height = 600 }
            orientation = center
            origo = center
            moveable = no
            click_to_front = no
            clipping = yes

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_bg"
                position = { x = 0 y = -20 }
                orientation = center
                alwaystransparent = yes
                centerposition = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_quote"
                position = { x = @QUOTE_OPTION_X y = @QUOTE_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_quote
                font = hoi4_typewriter22
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 160
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_text"
                position = { x = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_X y = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_text
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 170
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_trigger"
                position = { x = @TRIGGER_OPTION_X y = @TRIGGER_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_trigger
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_glow"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_Y }
                orientation = center
                quadTextureSprite = "GFX_national_obligations_option_icons_glow"
                scale = 1.2
            }

            buttonType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_first_option_button"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_Y }
                orientation = center
                spriteType = "GFX_industrial_awakening_option_first_button_gui"
                shortcut = "1"
                buttonText = ""
                buttonFont = cg_18b
            }
        }

        #Option 2
        containerWindowType = {

                orientation = center

                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes

                orientation = center

        }

            orientation = center
            origo = center
            moveable = no
            click_to_front = no
            clipping = yes

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_bg"
                position = { x = 0 y = -20 }
                orientation = center
                alwaystransparent = yes
                centerposition = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_quote"
                position = { x = @QUOTE_OPTION_X y = @QUOTE_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_quote
                font = hoi4_typewriter22
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 160
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_text"
                position = { x = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_X y = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_text

                maxHeight = 170
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_trigger"
                position = { x = @TRIGGER_OPTION_X y = @TRIGGER_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_trigger

                format = centre
                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_glow"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_Y }
                orientation = center
                quadTextureSprite = "GFX_national_obligations_option_icons_glow"
                scale = 1.2
            }

            buttonType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_industrial_awakening_third_option_button"

                orientation = center

    #Tsar Bomba
    containerWindowType = {
        name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_view"
        position = { x = 0 y = 0 }
        size = { width = 1000 height = 800 }
        orientation = center
        origo = center
        moveable = no
        click_to_front = no
        clipping = no
        fade_type = linear
        fade_time = 500

        buttonType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_confirm_button"
            position = { x = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_X y = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_Y }
            orientation = "CENTER"
            spriteType = "GFX_national_obligations_confirm_button_gui"
            shortcut = "RETURN"
            buttonText = LOC_sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_confirm_button
            buttonFont = cg_18b
            pdx_tooltip = LOC_sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_confirm_button_tt
            alwaystransparent = no
        }

        #Option 1
        containerWindowType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option"
            position = { x = @TWO_OPTION_FIRST_X y = @TWO_OPTION_FIRST_Y }
            size = { width = 250 height = 600 }
            orientation = center
            origo = center
            moveable = no
            click_to_front = no
            clipping = yes

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_bg"
                position = { x = 0 y = -20 }
                orientation = center
                alwaystransparent = yes
                centerposition = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_quote"
                position = { x = @QUOTE_OPTION_X y = @QUOTE_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center

                format = centre
                maxHeight = 160
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_text"
                position = { x = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_X y = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_text
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 170
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_trigger"
                position = { x = @TRIGGER_OPTION_X y = @TRIGGER_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_trigger
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_tsar_bomba_first_option_glow"

            position = { x = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_X y = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_Y }
            orientation = "CENTER"
            spriteType = "GFX_national_obligations_confirm_button_gui"
            shortcut = "RETURN"
            buttonText = LOC_sov_national_obligations_neverending_story_confirm_button
            buttonFont = cg_18b
            pdx_tooltip = LOC_sov_national_obligations_neverending_story_confirm_button_tt
            alwaystransparent = no
        }

                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes

            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_russian_realm_third_option_glow"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_Y }
                orientation = center
                quadTextureSprite = "GFX_national_obligations_option_icons_glow"
                scale = 1.2
            }

            buttonType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_russian_realm_third_option_button"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_Y }
                orientation = center
                spriteType = "GFX_russian_realm_option_third_button_gui"
                shortcut = "3"
                buttonText = ""
                buttonFont = cg_18b
            }
        }
    }

    #Rebirth
    containerWindowType = {
        name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_view"
        position = { x = 0 y = 0 }
        size = { width = 1000 height = 800 }
        orientation = center
        origo = center
        moveable = no
        click_to_front = no
        clipping = no
        fade_type = linear
        fade_time = 500

        buttonType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_confirm_button"
            position = { x = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_X y = @CONFIRM_BUTTON_Y }
            orientation = "CENTER"
            spriteType = "GFX_national_obligations_confirm_button_gui"
            shortcut = "RETURN"
            buttonText = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_confirm_button
            buttonFont = cg_18b
            pdx_tooltip = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_confirm_button_tt
            alwaystransparent = no
        }

        #Option 1
        containerWindowType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option"
            position = { x = @THREE_OPTION_FIRST_X y = @THREE_OPTION_FIRST_Y }
            size = { width = 250 height = 600 }
            orientation = center
            origo = center
            moveable = no
            click_to_front = no
            clipping = yes

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_bg"
                position = { x = 0 y = -20 }
                orientation = center
                alwaystransparent = yes
                centerposition = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_quote"
                position = { x = @QUOTE_OPTION_X y = @QUOTE_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_quote
                font = hoi4_typewriter22
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 160
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_text"
                position = { x = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_X y = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_text
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 170
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_trigger"
                position = { x = @TRIGGER_OPTION_X y = @TRIGGER_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_trigger
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_glow"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_Y }
                orientation = center
                quadTextureSprite = "GFX_national_obligations_option_icons_glow"
                scale = 1.2
            }

            buttonType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_first_option_button"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_Y }
                orientation = center
                spriteType = "GFX_rebirth_option_first_button_gui"
                shortcut = "1"
                buttonText = ""
                buttonFont = cg_18b
            }
        }

        #Option 2
        containerWindowType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option"
            position = { x = @THREE_OPTION_SECOND_X y = @THREE_OPTION_SECOND_Y }
            size = { width = 250 height = 600 }
            orientation = center
            origo = center
            moveable = no
            click_to_front = no
            clipping = yes

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_bg"
                position = { x = 0 y = -20 }
                orientation = center
                alwaystransparent = yes
                centerposition = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_quote"
                position = { x = @QUOTE_OPTION_X y = @QUOTE_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_quote
                font = hoi4_typewriter22
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 160
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_text"
                position = { x = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_X y = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_text
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 170
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_trigger"
                position = { x = @TRIGGER_OPTION_X y = @TRIGGER_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_trigger
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_glow"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_GLOW_Y }
                orientation = center
                quadTextureSprite = "GFX_national_obligations_option_icons_glow"
                scale = 1.2
            }

            buttonType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_second_option_button"
                position = { x = @FOCUS_BUTTON_X y = @FOCUS_BUTTON_Y }
                orientation = center
                spriteType = "GFX_rebirth_option_second_button_gui"
                shortcut = "2"
                buttonText = ""
                buttonFont = cg_18b
            }
        }

        #Option 3
        containerWindowType = {
            name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option"
            position = { x = @THREE_OPTION_THIRD_X y = @THREE_OPTION_THIRD_Y }
            size = { width = 250 height = 600 }
            orientation = center
            origo = center
            moveable = no
            click_to_front = no
            clipping = yes

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_bg"
                position = { x = 0 y = -20 }
                orientation = center
                alwaystransparent = yes
                centerposition = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_quote"

                orientation = center

                font = hoi4_typewriter22

                maxHeight = 160
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_text"
                position = { x = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_X y = @TOOLTIP_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_text
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 170
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            instantTextBoxType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_trigger"
                position = { x = @TRIGGER_OPTION_X y = @TRIGGER_OPTION_Y }
                orientation = center
                text = LOC_sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_trigger
                font = hoi_16mbs
                format = centre
                maxHeight = 65
                fixedsize = yes
                alwaystransparent = yes
            }

            iconType = {
                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_glow"

                orientation = center
                quadTextureSprite = "GFX_national_obligations_option_icons_glow"
                scale = 1.2
            }

                name = "sov_national_obligations_rebirth_third_option_button"

                orientation = center

                shortcut = "3"
                buttonText = ""
                buttonFont = cg_18b

        }
